chapters.title: Chapter 23: At the Edge of Time
chapters.info: Falion Bhoda, p. 427—Aes Sedai of the Black Ajah, formerly of the White. She fled the Tower as a novice to Ebou Dar before being discovered and brought back. She was then in service to Shiaine, as a maid. She feigned a relationship with Daved Hanlon so that the two could exchange information without arousing suspicions. She and the rest of the Black sisters with her attempted to capture Elayne when she and three other sisters surprised them in Caemlyn—they were captured by Birgitte and the Guards, and imprisoned in the dungeons of the Royal Palace. She escaped with Hanlon's assistance, and has since fled to the Blasted Lands, joining the Shadow as a Dreadlord. She was part of the link with Hessalam when she attacked Aviendha's circle.
